info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT COUNTY... At 450 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Hilton Head Island, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Beaufort, Port Royal, Shell Point, Hilton Head Airport, Forest Beach and Parris Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
